content.text:
# 2025 Louisiana–Monroe Warhawks football team

The 2025 Louisiana–Monroe Warhawks football team represent the University of Louisiana at Monroe in the Sun Belt Conference's West Division during the 2025 NCAA Division I FBS football season. The Warhawks are led by Bryant Vincent in his second year as the head coach. The Warhawks play their home games at Malone Stadium, located in Monroe, Louisiana.
Preseason
Media poll
In the Sun Belt preseason coaches' poll, the Warhawks were picked to finish last place in the West division.
Schedule
The football schedule was announced on February 28, 2025.
